content.html: USING a wheelchair. USES a wheelchair. just like WEARING glasses, WEARS glasses. not "confined to being behind frames" or "being behind frames" or "lens-bound." a wheelchair is a tool. a good tool. like glasses.
content.value:
USING a wheelchair. USES a wheelchair.

just like WEARING glasses, WEARS glasses.
not "confined to being behind frames" or "being behind frames" or "lens-bound."

a wheelchair is a tool. a good tool. like glasses.
